plot: An influential businessmen is stressed out by work. This leads to him being unable to perform in bed. He gets paranoid that his wife will start cheating on him. This idea, however, slowly becomes more and more appealing to him.
title: Experiencia mortal

original_name: Your Ticket Is No Longer Valid
